base_description: Rectangular white cabinet with modern design.
part_description: Includes a large front panel, three upper compartments, and a side handle. The compartments are evenly spaced, and the panel covers the lower section, with the handle on the right side.
internal_interaction_description: The front panel is hinged, allowing access to the interior storage space. The upper compartments are open, providing separate sections for organization. The side handle facilitates easy opening of the front panel, ensuring smooth operation.
external_interaction_description: Designed for placement against a wall, it provides storage and organization. The compartments can hold small items, while the large panel conceals larger objects. Users interact primarily through the handle to access contents, making it suitable for home or office environments.
